text: Allah (evvita makattuvamutaiyavanenral) avanait tavira vanakkattirkut takutiyana iraivan veruyarum illave illai. Avan (maranamilla) uyirullavan; enrum nilaiyanavan; avanai ciru urakkamum pitikkatu; perum nittiraiyum pitikkatu. Vanankal, pumiyil ullavai anaittum avanutaiyate. Avanutaiya anumatiyinri avanitattil (evarukkakilum) yartan parintu pecakkutum? Avarkalukku mun iruppavarraiyum avarkalukkup pin iruppavarraiyum avan nankarivan.
